text.content:
"Beware the Runebound Rangers, for they walk a treacherous path between humanity and monstrosity."

 – Gustav Einewurst, butcher

"Though their presence may unsettle the common folk, we must remember that they sacrifice their very humanity to stand as our shield against the encroaching darkness, forever bound to a destiny most would fear to face."

 – Friedrich von Steinberg, mayor

Reborn through experiments you wield sword and magic to fight off monsters of humanity.
